channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The NTSB is set to hold a hearing on the DCA midair collision. Here's what to know
item.description: The January midair collision near Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, which killed 67 people, is the topic of a three-day investigative hearing...

item.title: The Manhattan gunman believed he had CTE. What does that mean?
item.description: The gunman accused of killing four people in New York City suspected he had chronic traumatic encephalopathy, or CTE — a degenerative brain disease of...

item.title: Senators introduce resolution supporting prevention task force RFK Jr. may disband
item.description: The task force makes recommendations for medical screenings that doctors' groups rely on and that guide what preventive services most insurance covers...

item.title: Russian soldiers scammed and robbed of war cash on return from Ukraine
item.description: A number of cases emerge of servicemen targeted for their salaries and pay-offs by government officials.

item.title: Outcry after German zoo culled baboons due to overcrowding
item.description: The zoo in Nuremberg said it knew many people would be "upset" or "infuriated" by the decision.

item.title: All 4 victims in NYC office shooting have been identified

item.title: Greece claims 'invasion' in Crete as it tries to halt asylum on Med route
item.description: Greek migration minister Thanos Plevris says his country faces a "state of emergency".

item.title: Why plane turbulence is really becoming more frequent - and more severe
item.description: Flights are getting bumpier, thanks in part to climate change. But new studies are looking into innovative potential ways to turbulence-proof wings - ...

item.title: Watch: Hawaii Gov. Josh Green gives update on tsunami warning
item.description: Hawaii Gov. Josh Green and other officials provided an update and took questions as the state faced a tsunami warning after an 8.8 magnitude earthquak...

item.title: 7/29: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: Four people were killed in a mass shooting at a Manhattan office tower. Also, Ken Jennings brings brainpower in new trivia book.

item.title: Hawaii under tsunami warning, Japan issues alert after 8.8 quake off Russia

item.title: YouTube to be included in Australia's teen social media ban
item.description: The Australian government says the world-first ban is aimed at protecting youth from online harm.

item.title: Gunman in NYC office shooting tried to target NFL, mayor says
item.description: Shane Tamura, the shooter behind the deadly rampage in Midtown Manhattan,​ was apparently targeting NFL offices, NYC Mayor Eric Adams says.

item.title: In a first, the Senate confirms a new CDC director

item.title: A new executive order tackles causes of homelessness. Why are some advocates worried?

item.title: Victims of New York City shooting include a police officer and an executive at investment firm
